Minimact Documentation (VitePress) ‚Äã

This is the VitePress-powered documentation site for Minimact.

Development ‚Äã

bash
npm run dev

Visit http://localhost:5173

Build ‚Äã

bash
npm run build
npm run preview

Structure ‚Äã

Customization ‚Äã

Edit .vitepress/config.ts to customize:

  • Navigation
  • Sidebar
  • Theme colors
  • Social links
  • Search
